atomic_tests.name: Web Server Wordlist Scan
atomic_tests.description: This test will scan a target system with a wordlist of common directories and file paths.

executor.name: powershell
executor.command:
Import-Module "PathToAtomicsFolder/T1595.003/src/WebServerScan.ps1"
Invoke-WordlistScan -Target "#{target}" -Wordlist "#{wordlist}" -Timeout "#{request_timeout}" -OutputFile "#{output_file}"
Write-Host "Scan complete. Results saved to: #{output_file}"

wordlist.description: The wordlist to use for scanning

request_timeout.description: The timeout for each request (in seconds)
